member.name: D2D1_COMPATIBLE_RENDER_TARGET_OPTIONS
member.summary: Specifies additional features supportable by a compatible render target when it is created. This enumeration allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: D2D1_COMPATIBLE_RENDER_TARGET_OPTIONS.D2D1_COMPATIBLE_RENDER_TARGET_OPTIONS_NONE
member.summary: The render target supports no additional features.

member.name: D2D1_COMPATIBLE_RENDER_TARGET_OPTIONS.D2D1_COMPATIBLE_RENDER_TARGET_OPTIONS_GDI_COMPATIBLE
member.summary: The render target supports interoperability with the Windows Graphics Device Interface (GDI).
